bibl.title: Елегискиот воин во новиот фрагмент на Aрхилох (P.Oxy. LXIX4708). [The Elegiac Warrior in the New Archilochus Fragment (P.Oxy. LXIX 4708).]
bibl.note: 1. P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 (= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327). - 2. Archilochus and archaic elegy. - 3. The text of the elegy. - 4. Structure of the elegy. - 5. The elegiac warrior. - 6. Conclusion. - Avec résumés en macédonien et en anglais.

bibl.title: Systasis. E-journal of the Association of Classical Philologists "Antika"

bibl.seg: Daniela Toseva Nikolovska, Елегискиот воин во новиот фрагмент на Aрхилох (P.Oxy. LXIX4708). [The Elegiac Warrior in the New Archilochus Fragment (P.Oxy. LXIX 4708).]

1. P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 (= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327). - 2. Archilochus and archaic elegy. - 3. The text of the elegy. - 4. Structure of the elegy. - 5. The elegiac warrior. - 6. Conclusion. - Avec résumés en macédonien et en anglais.
